channel.title: [Request] Party Hats Randomly spawn [PI]
channel.description:
Hey guys, as some of you know RuneScape has made an event that party hats and other rares spawn around the world. I really want to add that in my server too, but I have no idea how. Its like it spawns in lets say Falador, and when someone picks it up it will spawn on another place in runescape. I want to add like 10 locations for it to spawn so players can go rare hunting. Anyone that is able to help me with this?
Thanks so much!

item.title: [Request] Party Hats Randomly spawn [PI]
item.dc:creator: @enzo42 enzo42
item.description:
@enzo42 wrote:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

You will have to convert the rest to PI yourself, and add the possible spawn locations yourself too.

Oh and by the way, wrong section.

Read full topic
